text: Drew Crevello is an American film studio executive known for his work with Warner Bros. studios. He has produced such films as The Grudge 2 and Tomb Raider. As a senior vice president of film production at Warner Bros. he worked on such films as Ben Affleck's Live by Night, X-Men: First Class, Kong: Skull Island and Knight and Day.
